CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS($Profile.Name , "Ads User") , text(month(from_Date__c)) & "/" & text(day(from_Date__c)) &"/" & text(year(from_Date__c)) & " - " & text(month(until_Date__c)) & "/" & text(day(until_Date__c)) & "/" & text(year(until_Date__c)), text(day(from_Date__c)) & "/" & text(month(from_Date__c)) & "/" & text(year(from_Date__c)) & " - " & text(day(until_Date__c)) & "/" & text(month(until_Date__c)) & "/" & text(year(until_Date__c)) )
CustomField.label: Period
